website_summaries.verdict: With its Cyber-shot DSC-HX30V, Sony packs a long 20x zoom lens, Wi-Fi, and GPS into one decidedly svelte camera. It's one of the more expensive compact superzoom models you'll find, but all those features along with high performance warrant the price.

With its Cyber-shot DSC-HX20V, Sony packs a long 20x zoom lens and GPS into one decidedly svelte camera. It's one of the more expensive compact superzoom models you'll find, but all those features along with high performance warrant the price.

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I have
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been out a long long time ago. Bought this used à couple years ago, just had to by a replacement screen as it was peeling off. Very good camera. You can shoot high frame rate full HD videos. The videos and photos come out pretty good looking. This is still the main and the only go to camera in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Aldee

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding camera
customer_reviews.text: My first Sony was stolen I bought this one used and just as pleased It has the best zoom of any camera I have used. Great pictures . panoramic option, movie, mini usb connectivity, all in such a small package. I don't carry Nikon D300 much even though I think it is probably better camera. I have gotten older and I just want small competent camera I can it in a fanny pack or pocket. I carry a very small tripod as well in the fannypack with small batteries and SD cards. The only thing nicer would be to use a polarizing filter.
customer_reviews.author: Mutant53

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, but small camera delivers spectacular pictures!
customer_reviews.text: This replaces a camera that got stolen from my baggage coming back into the states through airport security. It's 18.2 mega pixel capabilities quite outweigh those of previous cameras that I have owned. It's small size is easy to carry and manage. The pop-up flash works well in dim lighting. And the pictures are spectacular in detail -- almost like viewing HDTV versus a standard broadcast. The battery life is excellent and can be easily recharged on the go.
customer_reviews.author: K D

customer_reviews.title: Provides excellent images
customer_reviews.text: This camera is the perfect blend of size and quality. I have used it both for its photographic and video capabilities, and it has impressed me in both respects. Its a bit bulky to have in your pocket, however I use a small case strapped on a belt loop and you could easily forget its even there... but ready to use if you want to snatch it out for a quick pic. Look for test video on Youtube, especially how it performs in low light...you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Duotonex

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, great deal
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over at various different cameras before settling on this one. I've had Sony for my last 3 point and shoots, and was considering upgrading to switchable lenses until i saw that there are now 20x zoom point-and-shoots available. I researched and compared reviews for this and other brand cameras. As a whale watch enthusiast, zoom is very important, as is response time. I'm still getting the hang of this camera, more zoom= more shake and harder to catch the whales. but i love all the adjustable settings and modes. The review may go to 5 stars, once I've gotten the camera controls down better.
customer_reviews.author: J Novel

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding "Point and Shoot" Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing! "Point and shoot" says it all. Compact size, quick start-up, takes great pics in low light, fast action shots of our grandkids without motion blur, reasonable shutter lag delay time, solid feel, well built. Just set it to auto mode and shoot. No view finder but the 3 inch display is high resolution and very good outdoors - although I recommend an anti-glare screen protector for better visibility in the bright sun. And the 20x zoom lens is impressive on a camera this small.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey's Review

customer_reviews.title: I have taken a number of excellent photos with it.
customer_reviews.text: This is close to being the perfect camera for me. But, it's now quiet there. My requirements are : fits in my pocket, has GPS , and quality images. This camera does theses. It reads that it has manual controls. It really doesn't. Some of the settings are difficult to use including the manual mode and the 2 custom settings. This camera has been Discontinued, the replacement is the same camera with the GPS removed and wifi added. For most people taking family photos this may be to complicated of a camera to use. There are others that are more logical in operations.
customer_reviews.author: Rbendele

customer_reviews.title: Sony HX20V
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera as an addition to a Sony point & shoot we really like. This one has proven to take great pictures in a variety of settings. We recently went to a music festival. The crowd was pretty large and we didn't feel like fighting our way to the front to take pictures. We stood well back and zoomed in on the stage, at night, and took pictures of the performers that make it look like we were in the 10th row...very cool. Nice camera, lots of features, light weight, great pictures, fair price...very good combination.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Larson

customer_reviews.title: New favorite Camera
customer_reviews.text: I used to own 3 Canon point and shoot cameras (the last was a Canon ELPH300) as I don't want to fiddle with many adjustments while taking instant photos. I was satisfied with the quality of the Canon photos until I saw the outputs of this camera. It definitely was sharper, faster and had excellent low light results. I agree with the con written about the flash placement as one naturally holds point and shoot camera with the hand fingers on the particular spot of where the flash is placed.
customer_reviews.author: ReyR

customer_reviews.title: Fantasic Camera but poor pop up flash location
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this fine camera. Everything on it works great. The Zoom and the Macro are fantastic. The overall picture quality is perfect. Only one negative that's why 4 stars. The pop up flash is in a terrible location on the camera. Gets in the way of your fingers each and every time you use it, They put it right where you instinctively hold the camera to take pictures. Drives me crazy because I think the thing is going to break. Other than that this camera is a 10 stars in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Rich V.

customer_reviews.title: OK Product
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to the HX20V from the HX9V. Many other reviewers have written plenty on the model so I would only say one thing: The biggest issue I have is that this one is also slow in processing and the wait is frustrating when good shots have been missed time and again. Not to mention under strong sunlight you could not see anything with the 3" screen. This is a common issue with all the point-n-shoot cameras without a good old view finder.
customer_reviews.author: TSA-ORD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a little larger than a regular 'compact camera'. It is still small enough to fit in a purse & go. Takes amazing pictures right out of the box. I bought a SD card with a 'speed' (not sure the correct terminology) of 10. This camera takes pictures so fast!! My son and his cousins don't hold still long for pictures when they are together ... I have been searching for a camera that takes pictures fast one right after the other and this one is the best! 18mp and 20x zoom...I totally RECOMMEND this camera!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Absolutely love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: We just got back from a beautiful family vaction in sunny Orlando and this was by far the best camera I have ever owned. Clear pictures, powerful zoom, and best part is the Exmor R CMOS sensor/processor. My parents had met us in Orlando and my father had model similar to this but without the Exmor processor and it was a night and day difference. I could pick up great pictures in the amusement parks at night when he was unable to shoot anything. I highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: It has a really good zoom and tons of options for the filters and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife a couple of years back and it takes the craziest clear pictures!!! It has a really good zoom and tons of options for the filters and effects. If you want to really understand all that the camera can do, you have to reall read the manual. For a small camera, it has a ton of options and if you want to be able to carry your camera on you in your pocket or purse; this camera is perfect for you. Awesome buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: brian james lovingood

customer_reviews.title: Sony does it again
customer_reviews.text: Great picture with all the bells and whistles for control. Actually too much for a novice. But if you know what you need, you definitely can tweak it for a fantastic picture. Great pictures straight out of the camera. Video is not too bad. Only thing I am not fan of the the placement of the flash. Little awkward and not ergonomically designed, Otherwise, I recommend it especially if you can get a deal.
customer_reviews.author: jskim

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: We just started using this camera and are still learning about all the settings. We are not even amateur photographers, but we wanted to get a good point and shoot camera that also shot full HD video. We may have overbought compared to other cameras with specs nearly the same, but we wanted a camera that we know we can use for a very long time. All in all, we are thrilled with our purchase, and even happier with the price we were able to find at Amazon as opposed to Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied, good pictures, easy to use, one design flaw.
customer_reviews.text: So far I have enjoyed using this camera, with a few caveats. A design flaw is the charging connection and data transmit connection are on the bottom of the camera. So you have to lay the view screen side down on the table. I also have to disconnect it from my tripod every time I want to upload/charge. Also if your lens is extended fully, it can block the flash a little bit on certain applications. Still a decent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Michael

customer_reviews.title: Impressed w the photos and steady zoom
customer_reviews.text: I loved this camera, only issue is if u get dust behind the lens and that's the same with any pocket camera.
customer_reviews.author: A Thoughtful Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased a used camera at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: So far this camera has lived up to my expectations. The carry strap was damaged but was easly replaced with one I already had. No original box or manual, but who needs that stuff when the manual is availble online and the box probably would have ended up in the trash anyway. Takes great photo's and video! The steady shot works well and the zoom is amazing. Low light indoor photo and video works great! Took lots of video during our Christmas gatherings. I am happy with this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Kennyart

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera. I have an 8 month old baby, and this camera is fast enough to capture his every move. I had him in a swing, and while he was swinging back and forth I took many pictures of him that all came out perfectly clear. I have owned many Nikons and I have to say that this is a way better camera for capturing life as it is happening.
customer_reviews.author: Corie

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, a lot of features for your money.
customer_reviews.text: The photos generated with the camera are not for pixel-peepers. Zoomed in, most photos look a little "painted." But don't let that dissuade you if you are looking to upgrade from an older camera. My previous camera was a 5-megapixel Fuji that I've had for 7 years. The features and scene settings are remarkable. The auto-stabilization is very good. The sweep panorama mode works really well.  Movies and audio at 1080p are gorgeous. Low-light photos are a little soft, but look excellent. I have uploaded some test shots from the DC101 Chili Cookoff from May 12th.
customer_reviews.author: ACFFX

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: good picture quality even with the 20x zoom, good size not too big not too small, works well with its flash don't see much of red eye problem like the Panasonic zs I tried earlier, also better than those new Canon touch screen cameras in control. the only thing I wish it has is the a bigger sensor like 2.0, 1.8, but the size will be at least double.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne F.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: So far im loving the features of this camera. I got it to replace my old canon Powershot,which stupidly i forgot to take it to best buy to be serviced so my protection plan expired and they wouldnt give me new one. This looks very nice so far,i like the video with instant scene recognition and being able to shoot stills at the same time. Great ISO for shots in dark places without flash! Great overall but wish the aperture would go down further than 3.4.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiane Barauna

customer_reviews.title: Sony makes great cameras!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! I take thousands of pictures each year in my work as a landscape painter and I always carry this camera in my purse. My camera is subject to a lot of abuse. My first one of these cameras failed several years after I bought it because I dropped it while the lens was open repeatedly - it survived multiple injuries! I bought the same camera again because I couldn't find anything I liked as much. It takes fantastic pictures and will focus farther away than any other pocket camera I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Burklurka

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is the BEST! I took this camera to Hawaii and was able to take a picture of the moon on top of a dead volcanoes in Hawaii! The moon looks awesome and you can see large craters and other geographic irregularities. My pictures are beyond amazing. You can't really go wrong on Hawaii, but the camera helps others understand your infatuation with it's beauty!
customer_reviews.author: Kdvande

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera so far..
customer_reviews.text: I have a MUCH older sony cyber-shot from back in 2010, 8 mp. I had to update since the camera has been destroyed by my toddler and time, but I am so glad I chose this camera! I am NOT a camera expert, so I cannot give why its so great super detailed- just that it is great! Excellent pictures, and same menu layout as my old cyber-shot. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, compact, Packed wit features. Great camera foe vacationing capture that shot I dont like the in camera processing, photos tend to look to soft
customer_reviews.author: Arnalb

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: Gosh what can I say about this camera that hasn't already been said. The photo's are great for a point and shoot and the HD video is fantastic...even on a 55 inch screen. The software that comes with it is really good for downloading photos and video to your computer and is excellent for combining clips into one video. I'm extremly pleased with this fantastic little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H

customer_reviews.title: Best backup camera!
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at the functions of this camera. The panorama option is fantastic! I originally played with a friend's camera, and had to have one of my own. If you just need a camera for road trips and those outtings with friends, this is an excellent camera, I have a Nikon D90 which is great, but travel size wise this is a nice backup camera.
customer_reviews.author: Altavista785

customer_reviews.title: Good quality camera.
customer_reviews.text: Im just a normal person that used to use my iphone 5 to take pictures and i always thought they looked good. With that being said, right from the bat you can notice a HUGE difference in the quality of the pictures. The zoom in the camera is AMAZING and the best thing is that quality doesn't drop while using said function like it does on the iphone. Noise is no longer a problem with this camera, Im 100% pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value and Pics
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a family vacation after extensive research and it was awesome. The picture clarity and zoom options worked fantastic. Also for a small non SLR digital it was pretty fast. Battery life was good and charging is very quick and easy. This is the best small digital camera we have owned. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SPOTTS

customer_reviews.title: Best camera ever!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I'm still new to figuring it out, I'm very impressed. The picture quality and zoom capability make it an essential travel accessory.. The only down fall is that it is a tad bit heavy but the case allows foe better handling. Also the location of the flash is a little tricky when handling. If not careful it can cause blurry pictures if its pressed down on. Still working on getting more pictures as I travel.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Great professional grade camera
customer_reviews.text: This may be more camera than you may need to take pictures of the kids, but you won't regret having these many features in a compact package. You can take amazing photos if you learn how to use the camera manually or use intelligent auto to shoot away. A little pricey but this camera will be useful years from now for the manual/auto features. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilio

customer_reviews.title: love this camera
customer_reviews.text: we have had the sony for over two years now. Have had cannon's and nikons and we just love this camera. Great picks, awesome technology and decent zoom. We have a Nikon DSLR, but end up taking this camera with us on most vacations, etc. because of its excellent results and portability.
customer_reviews.author: dcminatl

customer_reviews.title: Just out of the box body flaw
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I was very disappointed to find a flaw in the plastic body of the camera. Right above the lens, there was something like a small slit showing a metallic band behind it. It doesn't affect the camera performance, but the flaw is noticeable, especially because it reflects light, when it's hit by it at the right angle. Otherwise the camera is great for a compact. A lot of features, good picture quality, great movies and neat panorama options & others. It's worth the money and then some. I am very pleased with its performance. Had it not been for the build problem I would have rated it a nice 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ina leonte

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cybershot DSC-HX20V
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, it's by far the fastest point and shoot I have ever had. The camera body is made of metal and feels solid unlike some digital cameras. Additionally, it has a 20X zoom lens that is great for a camera this size. Only thing I don't like about it is the location of the flash. This is a small camera so sometimes my fingers cover the popup flash. I would recommend this to anyone that wants a quality point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for price
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this new camera, I used many different one before, this one allow me to take (with no flash) few pitures very fast and get excellent picures of the children, it takes more time if flash is required, before, they would have already gone by the time I was ready to focus and take a new picture.
customer_reviews.author: florence

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the best camera on Amazon. I've purchased many cameras through this site and I've never came across one as nice as the HX20V. The only thing I don't like about this camera is that the charging port is on the bottom. Forcing you to always lay the camera on something soft when you need to charge it and to transfer pictures. This is very annoying feature that I don't like. P.S make sure you get the special jacket case that was made especially for this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Review_Man

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pictures
customer_reviews.text: But the menu and features are as difficult to use as Chinese Arithmetic. I hate not having an operators manual - using the built in one is a royal pain. Still no product specific carrying case that I can find. How difficult would it be for Sony to include one?
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Little

customer_reviews.title: Great (almost pocket almost mega zoom) camera
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it a month but the picture quality continues to amaze me. The movie mode is some of the best I have seem - including camcorders. get fancy with the settings or just leave it on Intelligent Auto + and let it figure everything out. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: B W

customer_reviews.title: Took good pictures while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas present in 2012, died in Sept 2013..... Typical of Sony, and only say thank God it happened a couple of months before the warranty ran out. UPDATE: Sony customer service is HORRIBLE refuses to fix the camera this will be the last sony purchase I ever make....
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: We very much love this camera
customer_reviews.text: We very much love this camera. It is wonderful. I wish we had had it when we went on our hike in the Sierra's. Our Sony DSC P200 took great pictures, but with this new cyber-shot DSC-HX20V we could have had much closer shots of the distant mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, versatile and quality shots
customer_reviews.text: Whoops, sorry, I talked about this camera under the cover LOL. Great camera, versatile and quality shots. Flash could be stronger, but that's the issue with all compact or semi-compact camera.
customer_reviews.author: HalZ

customer_reviews.title: Great for the mobile photographer
customer_reviews.text: Superb resolution for enlargements. Fits into my shirt pocket. Ready to go within seconds. Zoom is easy to use and powerful for scenery and animal pics. Easy to use. Best thing to do is go thru the manual and concentrate on the functions that you will use because it can do everything. Even can pic out certain colors and isolate them in a black and white background. Spent several hours around Ithaca, NY waterfalls experimenting with shutter speeds. Did fine. Excellent indoors and out. Would rec.
customer_reviews.author: Bilko

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: So far this camera has really impressed me. Great video, excellent zoom lens, vibrant color, great in low light. The only disappointment is that I thought at 18.2 MP the pictures would have been a bit sharper than they are. I'm very happy with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Stapelberg

customer_reviews.title: This Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX20V 18.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera with 20X is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera to fit in your purse and get the best results with it. There is so much you can do with it and so many different settings. The picture is so clear and if using for sports, you can get repetitive sequence shots that are incredible! It is easy to use and if you'll just take the time to read about the camera, you'll be surprised at it's capabilities. I have a big camera and I really think this can equal it especially with portability. The zoom is terrific and clear. In my opinion, and I did research it, I don't think you can do better than this little one.
customer_reviews.author: melody antonini

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact Concert Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for it's size. I use it for capturing memories at concerts. Also great as a tourist camera. Easy fits in your pocket. Great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: david simmons

customer_reviews.title: I thought that it was a great camera with a amazing 20x zoom
customer_reviews.text: I thought that it was a great camera with a amazing 20x zoom. My only concern was that when you zoom to the images were a bit blurry specially at high optical zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Alter

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I debated between this camera and a few point and shoot 20x zoom canons, ultimately chose the 20x, instead of 30x as setting up a wireless network from my camera and then logging on via smart phone or computer seemed to cumbersome compared to uploading directly to drop-box. Anyway, the pics have been amazing, from up close macros to portraits and landscapes. Very happy with the purchase and price has come down significantly in the past 3-4 months since the new Sony and Canon models are out for the year. It is a bit large to put in your pocket but doable.
customer_reviews.author: Denver

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX20V  18.2 MP  with 20x zoom
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera after dropping my HV 10 which I loved. The only issue with this camera is battery. You must charge in camera or when using a spare battery you have to reset functions.
customer_reviews.author: In to comfort and ease

customer_reviews.title: A fine camera and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: A fine camera and easy to use. It is light and compact and fits in shirt pocket for carrying. Elvin
customer_reviews.author: Elvin

customer_reviews.title: The best camera ever
customer_reviews.text: It takes excellent easy shoot photos,,,use it every where. Great smaller size and still works after all this time. Highly recommend this model. Color is really natural and great res.
customer_reviews.author: charmingbows-com

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding point and shoot camera. Bought as a gift, recipient loves it and is getting a tremendous amount of use out of it for family photos and trips. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Everyday Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It does deserve all the high praises shared by the other customers, but the pictures it takes do have that waterpainting look when viewed at 100%. Had that not been the case, I would have given the camera 5 stars. Still, compared to the 7-year-old camera I had before, which is bulky and only 7-MP, it is a tremendous upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy H.

customer_reviews.title: An excellent overall camera.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this camera. It took great pictures and videos. I sold it to upgrade to an RX100, but I have no complaints about the HX20V. It was a good, solid camera.
customer_reviews.author: Borocay

customer_reviews.title: Good for a PnS
customer_reviews.text: Not to happy with the DPI output being less than 300 especially in this dan and age of the digital camera. Overall take a decent photograph and works well with the wife
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Yendor

customer_reviews.title: a great camera
customer_reviews.text: one of the very best purchases i have ever made. purchased this after seeing the quality of the pictures and video. a very well built item. a great product from sony!
customer_reviews.author: tms1075

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: I just got this camera specifically for the shutter speed and the soft snap. It takes beautiful pictures, especially portraits. My friends and family are in love with how soft snap improves their appearance without compromising the quality of the background (like other cameras trying to do soft snap do). Also, this camera is AMAZING in low lights without flash. Great for those romantic restaurants with the dim lighting!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Bought exact camera about 5 years ago and it was dropped, screen cracked. Liked it so much I bought another one just like it. Has a really good zoom with little to no blur. No hesitation when taking more than one picture. And great color quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should be better.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality and the outcome of my pictures. the zoom is perfect. the only thing I do not like is the fact that the flash pop up, which is not convenient for me.
customer_reviews.author: kokou h. sewodor

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it for 1 month so far and it's working great it takes great pictures even in low light conditions, the zoom is simply fantastic, and i like picture effects and the manual mode where we can control the iso and the exposure which could get it up to 30 seconds the only cons about it is the lake of manual, but i ended up by finding a complete online help on the sony website here:
customer_reviews.author: zaki

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great point and shoot camera. Recently used it on a trip to Alaska and got great shots. Very flexible in many different lighting and photographic situations.
customer_reviews.author: Viking

customer_reviews.title: Great Sony Camera for the back packer
customer_reviews.text: An excellent pocket camera. A viewfinder would be 5+ stars for sure. Bought used so I could save money toward purchase of RX1.
customer_reviews.author: Gafradu

customer_reviews.title: Very nice compact camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera, it feels very solid not as cheap as other cameras. One bad thing is that while you record a video and you zoom in/out, the zoom mechanism will generate some noise. But it's very great and I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Rodriguez Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: excellent but someone stole it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Used it one day in Africa, put it down for one minute, turned away and it got stolen. This is the 2nd time someone stole this particular camera from me, both times in Africa. So thieves in Livingstone, Africa must know this is a high quality camera. My only regret is that I don't have it anymore. I am a missionary/aid worker. If you know of any freebies or give aways on this model let me know! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: margo

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is just wonderful. It takes clear, crisp pictures and is easy to carry along on motorcycle rides, etc. Great little camera!!
customer_reviews.author: Kjeep

customer_reviews.title: best camera EVER
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes AWESOME pictures! Many of my friends have bought it after seeing my photos. Sony did a fine job with this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Ms

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Quality exceeded my expectations and got an overall great deal as my first camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: It is fast. Pictures are crispy. Thhe 3D, panorama and low light features work beautifully. I would recommend to everyone who is looking for high end but non SLR camera.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, but wrong place for the flash
customer_reviews.text: You can shoot very good pictures with this camera. Only thing I don't like is the positioning of the flash. It is at a spot where most people would hold a camera - it would try to pop up automatically and due to the pressure of the fingers, it would go back in. Don't know after how many times like that it would just stop working.
customer_reviews.author: SANJAY A MATHEW

customer_reviews.title: Super Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was a replacement for an identical model that I had broke. I liked the original camera so much that I only wanted the same camera as a replacement and was pleased to be able to get it through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX20V 18.2 MP
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera with very good point and shoot capabilities. Takes fast pictures, so I can actually get shots of my kids. Not a DSLR replacement but a very good travel companion. I have actually retired my older Sony video camera since purchasing this camera. Highly recommend...
customer_reviews.author: Jim Chancy

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our daughter. From everything we've heard from her, she is well pleased with the camera. Great pictures, great video. I think we made a great pick. This is the 3rd Sony camera that we have purched over the years. All are still working and have not had any trouble with any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, upgrade from DSC-HX9V. Delivered as promised! This product has been great for family photos, outdoor photos, and vacation pictures. Eventually I'll purchase a more robust DSLR, but this is a great beginning camera as well as a camera for experienced photographers. Great on the go
customer_reviews.author: Davey Krause

customer_reviews.title: A great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my fiance for his birthday and he loves it! The pictures are great quality and all of the different shooting modes make it easy to capture anything!
customer_reviews.author: Maegan Moon

customer_reviews.title: sony has a winner
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures of fast moving objects like pets and stills. Lots of fun features. Fast to start and takes amazing video.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy P

customer_reviews.title: Camera has muscle
customer_reviews.text: The camera's zoom is very good ... outstanding. The options are more than enough to satisfy needs. pictures appear shape
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Eubanks JR

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for an Europe trip, the pictures were amazingly sharp, even in moving or low light condition, quick shutter response, had a lot of amenities, like 3D or panoramic pics, the zoom is awesome. Handy and fast response. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Mondragon

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Can't argue with most reviewers here, this is the best camera that I've owned. Photos look great and videos amazing. I am quite happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far. Easy to use yet can do so much. Takes awhile to learn the features but time well spent. Only thing is the flash always seems to find my finger when it pops up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: there were some other improvements like changing the USB plug to a normal micro usb ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace a HX9V. Despite being mainly an upgrade in zoom and megapixels, there were some other improvements like changing the USB plug to a normal micro usb plug.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R. Hood

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-HX20V
customer_reviews.text: Camera meets most of my expectations, but not all. I own a Sony DSC-T100 camera & like it's "Bracket" feature better than that of the HX20V. The delay between the bracket shots is too short on the HX20 (i.e. even the longest delay option is much too short). A longer delay allows capture of a sequence of "action shots" providing the opportunity to choose the "best" shot, or shots of the sequence. The HX20 delay between bracket shots is so short that there is virtually no difference in the "action" between the sequence shots. Also, the camera is not as "quick on" as the T100 camera. There is a definite setup delay when the camera starts up.
customer_reviews.author: PBT

customer_reviews.title: High quality resolution and editing capabiltites
customer_reviews.text: Bought for wife's Christmas present and she loves it. Has a much better resolution than previous camera and enables her to edit photos.
customer_reviews.author: nashman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good camera that I would be able to bring into concerts. This camera is small enough to fit in my pocket, and take takes great shots. The price was very reasonable, and I am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick K. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. This camera takes great pictures at night, and has a much faster shutter response than my previous camera which was a Cannon. I have always been a Cannon fan, but this Sony has changed my opinion. The only thing I don't like about the camera is the placement of the pop up flash. It comes out right where you would normally hold the camera. But I am getting used to it and this is a very minor complaint. The camera takes amazing pictures for a camera in this price range. It has several cool easy to figure out settings, and holds a charge for a long time. I highly reccomend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Emory

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: the zoom is amazing and it works great in concerts, that was what I wanted for, that's why I am completly satisfied with this camera, and it has a perfect size also.
customer_reviews.author: Nzoft

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera with a lot going for it !
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this camera for it's many features & compact light weight. I great grab & shoot camera while on the go !
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera, I really loved it. It is new unpacked camera came with 1 year manufacture warranty. I got package in the second day. I would recommend this seller for any product.
customer_reviews.author: Boopathy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pictures
customer_reviews.text: I review many programs included on this camara, and set them up as well, It is amazing what you can do. By using the proper printer and ink I cut and paste in my album great quality pictures. Yes I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ALBINO VALLES

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX20V
customer_reviews.text: I brought this as a critmas present for my wife and she just loves it. Still trying to figure out all the special settings that it has but she will get tere. Takes the greatest pics that I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I specifically love the sweep panorama feature; it's fascinating how seamless it stitches it all together. The zoom is also fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber
customer_reviews.text: We took this camera on our trip to Dubai and took a lot of pictures and when we got back they turned out great. We couldn't believe the clairity of the pictures or the vidieo itself. I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: ken berger

customer_reviews.title: Sony camera
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful camera! Used it on our cruise and it made beautiful pictures. So many options, so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Larry W. St. John

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: The zoom is amazing! I took photos at Fort Bragg this weekend that were fabulous! They were very sharp and clear!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is by far the best Sony small size camera I have ever used. I am a very serious photographer but I use this more than my expensive equipment. The lens is excellent and the performance is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Russell J. Pendred

customer_reviews.title: Good but not sure it will last long
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good camera with many features and high quality pictures. The material is not super-solid so I don't know how many years it can last. One has to pay attention not to damage it as it is somehow fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Gianluca

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It takes beautiful pictures, but sometimes it doesn't want to turn on and takes hitting the button a few times. I've not used it that much, so that was slightly disappointing, but other than that I've been very satisfied. Perfect for concerts and everything else. Handy little camera.
customer_reviews.author: E. White

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera and I am extremely happy with it. The quality of the pictures are awesome. Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: kelis john

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Camera
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera, easy to use. It travels well and takes great photos. It's slender but has the power of a larger camera.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dwan

customer_reviews.title: I love love love lovemy camera ! I use it all the time. I tote it in my handbag everywhere I go.
customer_reviews.text: I love love love lovemy camera ! I use it all the time. I tote it in my handbag everywhere I go.
customer_reviews.author: Darla J Pair

product_meta.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX20V 18.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera with 20x Optical Zoom and 3.0-inch LCD (Black) (2012 Model)
product_meta.description: Shoot gorgeous stills with the 18.2MP Exmor R CMOS sensor and thanks to super-fast, DSLR-like focusing speeds, youll get amazing results that take full advantage of the cameras sharp Sony G lens, even in low light. Get closer to the excitement with the 20x Optical/40x Clear Image Zoom capabilities or use dual record to shoot full 1080/60p HD while simultaneously capturing stunning still images Active 3-way stabilization helps eliminate camera shake aggravation with when shooting videos. Start creating a virtual map of what happened where by recording shot location and direction with GPS and Compass functionalities. Add an all-new dimension of awe and wonder to your creations with 3D Still Image and 3D Sweep Panorama mode. View it all in crystal clarity on the 3.0" Xtra Fine LCD TruBlack display.FEATURES: 18.2MP Exmor R CMOS sensor - The 18.2MP Exmor R CMOS sensor captures ultra-high definition images that take full advantage of the cameras sharp Sony G lens. An advanced BIONZ processor rapidly analyzes the Extra-High Sensitivity data from the sensor, and activates By-Pixel Super Resolution technologies to reduce noise levels up to 6X compared to previous CMOS sensors, resulting in stunning low light images with incredible details.Full HD 1080/60p - Record crystal clear movies at the highest resolution available with capabilities for 60i in 1080 AVCHD video. This provides stunning, fast motion video with less distortion for playback on your HD TV.2 With dual record of stills and movies, you can shoot both at the same time.Capture the decisive moment with up to 10fps - Capture full 18.2 megapixel resolution images at up to 10 frames per second, helping to ensure that the decisive moment is captured such as the soccer ball flying into the goal. In addition, a mechanical shutter helps reduce distortion when continuously shooting moving subj
feature_bullets: 18.2 megapixels "Exmor R" CMOS sensor for superior low-light performance
GPS and Compass record shot location & direction
Optical SteadyShot image stabilization with 3-way Active Mode,1-Year Limited Parts & 90-Day Labor Warranty
